
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(contrib-libs-uuid)
target_compile_options(contrib-libs-uuid PRIVATE
  -DHAVE_CONFIG_H
  $<IF:$<CXX_COMPILER_ID:MSVC>,,-Wno-everything>
)
target_include_directories(contrib-libs-uuid PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid
)
target_link_libraries(contrib-libs-uuid PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
)
target_sources(contrib-libs-uuid PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/clear.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/compare.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/copy.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/gen_uuid.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/isnull.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/pack.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/parse.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/randutils.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/unpack.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/unparse.c
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/uuid/uuid_time.c
)
